snippet.title: Layers of Fear - Cinematic Intro
snippet.description:
Step into the unsettling world of Layers of Fear, where mysteries and danger lurk around every corner. With only one month left until the release of the Layers series' crowning work, we invite you to watch the cinematic intro of the upcoming game.

Join the Writer on a gripping journey into the foreboding Lighthouse and witness the chilling horrors lurking within its decaying walls.

Layers of Fear coming out June 2023 on PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, and Xbox Series S.  

Don't forget to share your thoughts on this video in the comment section below. And be sure to add the game to your wishlist and follow us on Steam for the latest news.

Steam wishlist here: https://bit.ly/LoF_on_Steam 
Playstion wishlist here: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10004877/

#LayersOfFear #Intro
